name: Sens

biography.description: Sens deploys the R.O.U. Projector System that creates a wall of light, blocking line of sight for defenders and providing cover for attacking teammates during pushes and plants.

gameplayTips: Use the R.O.U. to create visual cover when planting the defuser or advancing to the objective.
Deploy the R.O.U. to block multiple angles simultaneously during a push.
Remember that the light wall only blocks vision, not bullets or movement.
Combine with smoke grenades from teammates for maximum visual coverage.
